title: Budget 2024-2025: Long-term capital gains tax increased to 12.5% from 10%
selftext: This budget is a letdown. While I can accept the short-term capital gains tax hike, increasing long-term capital gains tax by 2.5% is unfair. Retail investors are already paying high taxes and GST; adding more burden on long-term gains hits them hard. What’s the reasoning behind this?
